texts.text: An error occurred during path resolving, aborting
Are you sure you want to delete this file/folder?
Directory listing successful for "%s" (%s file(s) found)
Error, can't upload file "%s" to FTP server
Error, can't upload file "%s" to oneye server (check maximum filesize accepted by PHP?)
Error while downloading file "%s"! Transfer aborted.
Error while trying to browse local folder!
Error while uploading file! Transfer aborted.
Error while uploading file! Transfer aborted. (Do you have sufficient permissions?)
Error while uploading file "%s"! Transfer aborted.
Failed to connect to specified host!
Help and FAQ available on the eyeOS wiki: %s
Passive mode failed! Data transfers will be performed in active mode
Please specify a host to connect to
Select a file to upload to path:
Type the name of the new folder
Type the new name/location of the file/folder
Unable to browse directory's content at "%s".
Unable to create directory, error occured. (Do you have sufficient permissions?)
Unable to create temporary file! Download aborted.
Unable to delete directory's content at "%s".
Unable to delete file, error occured. (Do you have sufficient permissions?)
Unable to delete folder, error occured. (Do you have sufficient permissions?)
Unable to download directory, error occured
Unable to download file, error occured
Unable to list files, error occured
Unable to list files, error occured. (Do you have sufficient permissions?)
Unable to read temporary file! Upload aborted.
Unable to rename selection, error occured. (Do you have sufficient permissions?)
Unable to upload file, error occured
Unable to write file, try to check permissions.
Unknown error occured during upload operation
You must select a file or a folder first
You must select a host to delete
You must select a host to edit
You must select a host to load
You must select a local file
You must select a remote file
You must specify a hostname, a port and a username
